name: Flappy Bird | Interactive Components
description:
How to Create Game Prototypes in Figma | Using Interactive Components. With the new interactive components feature it has become easier than before to create simple 2D Game Prototypes through which you can convey your game idea to stakeholders or game developers rather than just conveying it verbally or with sketches.

#GamePrototyping #InteractiveComponents


Explanation & Demo: https://youtu.be/XrF7-Ds-0YQ
